titles.title: Coast Guard Authorization Act of 2017

Coast Guard Authorization Act of 2017
To authorize appropriations for the Coast Guard for fiscal years 2018 and 2019, and for other purposes.
Coast Guard Authorization Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.
Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation Discharged.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 115-194.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 133.
